EnhancedContent:
Following my complete failure at removing Desktop, Documents, Downloads, Music, Pictures and Videos from Explorer, I'm now directing my impotent hammer at the right-click context menu. No matter what utility I've used, none will display ALL the unsolicited junk that robs our real-estate and distracts our eyes with undesired clutter. Even adding all the appropriate hieroglyphics to HKEY\_CURRENT\_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Shell Extensions\Blocked... the bloat simply won't leave.

Today, my new targets are:

Cast to Device Convert to Adobe PDF Copy as path Create with Designer Edit with Paint Edit with Photos Print Restore previous versions Rotate left Rotate right Scan with Microsoft Defender... Share

Can you recommend any good crowbars. Thanks Peter
